p: The Python environment available in the ETE3 programming interface was applied for the analysis and visualization of phylogenomic data [ 35]. The presence of a phylogenetic signal was investigated through the likelihood mapping analysis using TREE-PUZZLE v.5.2 (available at: http://www.tree-puzzle.de) [ 36, 37]. The Pairwise Homoplasy Index (PHI) test for recombination was conducted with the SplitsTree v.4.10 following the default settings [ 38]. The reliability of the nodes was analyzed by Shimodaira-Hasegawa- (SH-) like test support values with 1000 replications [ 39].
